name: Dungeon of Solace
description:
Wow, not finished, but we had to submit something!

Here are the passwords for the spells:
Password 1: UP DOWN LEFT RIGHT UP

Password 2: DOWN UP LEFT DOWN RIGHT

Password 3: LEFT RIGHT UP DOWN DOWN

Password 4: DOWN LEFT UP UP RIGHT

Password 5: RIGHT RIGHT LEFT RIGHT RIGHT

Big thanks to BackAt50Ft for the work on the art and the extremely valuable coding advice!
